Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. Number Four -- 22.71 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District Number Four Proposition
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 22.71 mills property tax continuation for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating facilities and equipment to provide fire protection and emergency medical service to the public, including the payment of salaries and the cost of obtaining water for fire protection.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District Number Four of St. Helena Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of twenty-two and seventy-one hundredths (22.71) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $152,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating facilities and equipment to provide fire protection and emergency medical service to the public, including the payment of salaries and the cost of obtaining water for fire protection, said millage to represent a two and seventy-one hundredths mills (2.71) increase over the 20 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2011 pursuant to an election held on May 4, 2002?
